messages.subject: Help for the Samurai Archives...!
messages.msgSnippet: During the server crash at the samurai archives site we apparently lost 5 .jpg s of clan genealogies - the Ukita clan, the Takeda clan, the Hosokawa clan and
messages.messageBody:
During the server crash at the samurai archives site we apparently
lost 5 .jpg's of clan genealogies - the Ukita clan, the Takeda clan,
the Hosokawa clan and the Chosokabe clan (the remaining clans can be
found here http://www.samurai-archives.com/clanindex.html to jog your
memory) - we are hoping (!!!) that someone may have downloaded and
copied them to thier computer - if so, we would be extremely grateful
if you could let us know, and get copies of them to us ASAP! feel
free to email the list or email us directly at kitsuno@...

Many thanks in advance for any assistance!

C. West and F.W. Seal
